00026 // Header file for Fortran Lapack
00027 
00028 #ifndef LAPACK_H
00029 #define LAPACK_H
00030 
00031 // This file incomplete and included here to only demonstrate the
00032 // basic framework for linking with the Fortran Lapack routines.
00033 
00034 #include "tnt/fortran.h"
00035 #include "tnt/vec.h"
00036 #include "tnt/fmat.h"
00037 
00038 
00039 #define F77_DGESV   dgesv_
00040 #define F77_DGELS   dgels_
00041 #define F77_DSYEV   dsyev_
00042 #define F77_DGEEV   dgeev_
00043 
00044 extern "C"
00045 {
00046 
00047     // linear equations (general) using LU factorizaiton
00048     //
00049     void F77_DGESV(cfi_ N, cfi_ nrhs, fda_ A, cfi_ lda,
00050         fia_ ipiv, fda_ b, cfi_ ldb, fi_ info);
00051 
00052     // solve linear least squares using QR or LU factorization
00053     //
00054     void F77_DGELS(cfch_ trans, cfi_ M, 
00055         cfi_ N, cfi_ nrhs, fda_ A, cfi_ lda, fda_ B, cfi_ ldb, fda_ work, 
00056             cfi_ lwork, fi_ info);
00057 
00058     // solve symmetric eigenvalues
00059     //
00060     void F77_DSYEV( cfch_ jobz, cfch_ uplo, cfi_ N, fda_  A, cfi_ lda, 
00061         fda_ W, fda_ work, cfi_ lwork, fi_ info);
00062 
00063     // solve unsymmetric eigenvalues
00064     //
00065     void F77_DGEEV(cfch_ jobvl, cfch_ jobvr, cfi_ N, fda_ A, cfi_ lda,
00066         fda_ wr, fda_ wi, fda_ vl, cfi_ ldvl, fda_ vr, 
00067         cfi_ ldvr, fda_ work, cfi_ lwork, fi_ info);
00068 
00069 }
00070 
00071 // solve linear equations using LU factorization
00072 
00073 using namespace TNT;
00074 
00075 Vector<double> Lapack_LU_linear_solve(const Fortran_Matrix<double> &A,
00076     const Vector<double> &b)
00077 {
00078     const Fortran_integer one=1;
00079     Subscript M=A.num_rows();
00080     Subscript N=A.num_cols();
00081 
00082     Fortran_Matrix<double> Tmp(A);
00083     Vector<double> x(b);
00084     Vector<Fortran_integer> index(M);
00085     Fortran_integer info = 0;
00086 
00087     F77_DGESV(&N, &one, &Tmp(1,1), &M, &index(1), &x(1), &M, &info);    
00088 
00089     if (info != 0) return Vector<double>(0);
00090     else
00091         return x;
00092 }
00093 
00094 // solve linear least squares problem using QR factorization
00095 //
00096 Vector<double> Lapack_LLS_QR_linear_solve(const Fortran_Matrix<double> &A,
00097     const Vector<double> &b)
00098 {
00099     const Fortran_integer one=1;
00100     Subscript M=A.num_rows();
00101     Subscript N=A.num_cols();
00102 
00103     Fortran_Matrix<double> Tmp(A);
00104     Vector<double> x(b);
00105     Fortran_integer info = 0;
00106 
00107     char transp = 'N';
00108     Fortran_integer lwork = 5 * (M+N);      // temporary work space
00109     Vector<double> work(lwork);
00110 
00111     F77_DGELS(&transp, &M, &N, &one, &Tmp(1,1), &M, &x(1), &M,  &work(1),
00112         &lwork, &info); 
00113 
00114     if (info != 0) return Vector<double>(0);
00115     else
00116         return x;
00117 }
00118 
00119 // *********************** Eigenvalue problems *******************
00120 
00121 // solve symmetric eigenvalue problem (eigenvalues only)
00122 //
00123 Vector<double> Upper_symmetric_eigenvalue_solve(const Fortran_Matrix<double> &A)
00124 {
00125     char jobz = 'N';
00126     char uplo = 'U';
00127     Subscript N = A.num_rows();
00128 
00129     assert(N == A.num_cols());
00130 
00131     Vector<double> eigvals(N);
00132     Fortran_integer worksize = 3*N;
00133     Fortran_integer info = 0;
00134     Vector<double> work(worksize);
00135     Fortran_Matrix<double> Tmp = A;
00136 
00137     F77_DSYEV(&jobz, &uplo, &N, &Tmp(1,1), &N, eigvals.begin(), work.begin(),
00138         &worksize, &info);
00139 
00140     if (info != 0) return Vector<double>();
00141     else
00142         return eigvals;
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 // solve unsymmetric eigenvalue problems 
00147 //
00148 int eigenvalue_solve(const Fortran_Matrix<double> &A, 
00149         Vector<double> &wr, Vector<double> &wi)
00150 {
00151     char jobvl = 'N';
00152     char jobvr = 'N';
00153 
00154     Fortran_integer N = A.num_rows();
00155 
00156 
00157     assert(N == A.num_cols());
00158     
00159     if (N<1) return 1;
00160 
00161     Fortran_Matrix<double> vl(1,N);  /* should be NxN ? **** */
00162     Fortran_Matrix<double> vr(1,N);  
00163     Fortran_integer one = 1;
00164 
00165     Fortran_integer worksize = 5*N;
00166     Fortran_integer info = 0;
00167     Vector<double> work(worksize, 0.0);
00168     Fortran_Matrix<double> Tmp = A;
00169 
00170     wr.newsize(N);
00171     wi.newsize(N);
00172 
00173 //  void F77_DGEEV(cfch_ jobvl, cfch_ jobvr, cfi_ N, fda_ A, cfi_ lda,
00174 //      fda_ wr, fda_ wi, fda_ vl, cfi_ ldvl, fda_ vr, 
00175 //      cfi_ ldvr, fda_ work, cfi_ lwork, fi_ info);
00176 
00177     F77_DGEEV(&jobvl, &jobvr, &N, &Tmp(1,1), &N, &(wr(1)),
00178         &(wi(1)), &(vl(1,1)), &one, &(vr(1,1)), &one,
00179         &(work(1)), &worksize, &info);
00180 
00181     return (info==0 ? 0: 1);
00182 }
